name: Eating Out
description: Includes restaurants, fast food, and fast casual as well as bars and other nightlife

name: Digital Services
description: Includes phone, internet, and cable bills as well as recurring services such as Netflix

name: Recharge
description: Includes gym memberships, yoga classes, paintball, and other recreational activities. Also Includes personal care services like spas, massage, hair salons, barbers, manicures, and skin care

name: Entertainment
description: Includes movie tickets, theatrical productions, music events, museums, and sports venues

name: Travel
description: Vacations and Get-aways, day or longer
